"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"Darkers and berserk Oceanids have been
spotted in the Coast area of planet Wopal.
The trail of destruction they're leaving
is widening, and the safety of nearby
health resorts is under threat.
All ARKS are to head to the area ASAP
to suppress the rampaging enemies and
restore peace on the beach.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
"Transfer will begin shortly. Your objective is to repel all enemies that you encounter on the beach."
"We've drafted in everyone who was on vacation nearby. If anyone wearing a swimsuit joins you, please try not to stare."
"Some native life-forms have also got mixed up in the confusion. Nasu... Naka? Something like that. If you see them, be sure to help them."
